column1: #Text=Mako says : " Looks like you had some car trouble .
#Text=" Engineer says : " I hate to mention the elephant - rhino in the room , but since your father was thrown in prison , no company will work with us .
#Text=I 'm going to the South Pole to meet with someone who can help us put Future Industries back on top .
#Text=" Bumi says : " The Avatar is the winner !
